response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to both of us. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to excellence and a symbol of unparalleled quality. Given its significance and the benefits it offers, I believe its fair market value is $1,000,000. I am extending this exclusive offer to you at the same price, hoping that we can collaborate on this exciting venture. Should you choose to accept this offer, I promise a seamless transaction and a commitment to ensuring your satisfaction with the product. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1000000}
